channel.title: Linux on OrganGrinderrr
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on OrganGrinderrr

item.title: Archlinux Customization Full Guide
item.description: archlinux minimal installation # grab image file nmctl connect to internet archinstall luks, no need for greeter setup users and package manager # pacman -S base-devel git git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/yay.git makepkg -si install hyprland or sway # yay -S hyprland sway swayidle swaylock wmenu librewolf-bin nerd-fonts zsh wl-clipboard grim artem wireguard-tools mpv neovim fastfetch btop slurp dmenu-wl brightnessctl hyprlock nvchad oh-my-zsh wl-recorder gdb gcc btop ranger libvirt optional: wofi, ripgrep jq mat2 rofi imv feh httpie wf-recorder wofi dmenu-wl wmenu replace swaybar with waybar # yay -S waybar comment out your current swaybar in your sway config and add this line “bar swaybar_command waybar” # install login manager tui-greet and screenlock swaylock # systemctl enable greetd configure /etc/greetd/config.

item.title: Install Nethunter on Oneplus 8T
item.description: Step 1. Download prerequsitions. # CrDroid-8.7-kebab-ROM payload-dumper-go Nethunter-crdroid-overlay Nethunter-crdroid-kernel Magisk TWRP-recovery Step 2. Flash crdroid rom # Reboot into fastboot and exec the following command. unzip crDroidAndroid-12.1-20220728-kebab-v8.7.zip tar xzvf payload-dumper-go*.tar.gz chmod +x ./payload-dumper-go* ./payload-dumper-go* payload.bin cd extracted_*_* ls -1 *.img | sed s/.img//g | xargs -I {} fastboot flash {} {}.img If you encounter some error, you might need to disable oem lock by fastboot oem unlock And if there are errors about not enough disk space left, you should delete some partitions.
